title: Dog Class Interactive Playground
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: High School Computer Science
description: Interactive MicroSim for creating Dog objects and calling methods

learningObjectives: Create Dog objects with different attribute values
Call instance methods and observe their output

keyQuestions: What happens when you create a Dog object?
How does birthday() change the object's state?
What is the difference between str and repr output?
commonMisconceptions: Students may not realize each object has its own independent data
assessmentOpportunities: Explain why two dogs can have different ages
